PHOTO GALLERY

By Climat


In each mission and event we have participated in, we captured the moments and the efforts that we have experienced for records and documentation purposes.

2023

California Fire

California Wildfire happens annually. They have a support line for this disaster. Climat, this year, played a part to provide manpower directly at the site; helping out with debris and ash, logistics, providing essentials to those in need and any helps possible.

2023

Ethiopian Drought

Ethiopians are currently facing drought. The lack of rain caused the crop and livestock to be in severe loss which also affects human food insecurity and water supply. Together with our partners, we provided them with immediate support including food, essentials, and health check.

2022

Brisbane Flood

There were hundreds of volunteers from Climat who participated in aiding Brisbane's flood victims by cleaning up the mess and repairing and disposing of damaged furniture. There was support for the elderly in certain suburbs as well.

2021

Great Barrier Restoration

Coral Reef is an important habitat for marine ecosystems and lives who live by the coastline. Coral Bleaching happens fast, hence Climat joined the Great Barrier Reef Foundation with the campaign to restore back some of our reefs by planting corals along the coastline.
